languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько секунд, ее взгляд устремлен куда-то мимо вас. Медленно, растягивая слова, она отвечает:{/n} "Так и быть. Я пойду с тобой".
{n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько секунд, ее взгляд устремлен куда-то мимо вас. Медленно, растягивая слова, она отвечает:{/n} "Так и быть. Я пойду с тобой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."
{n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."
{n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."
{n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了几秒钟，视线定格在你身后的东西上。随后，她慢慢地答道。{/n}“好吧，我愿意与你同行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了几秒钟，视线定格在你身后的东西上。随后，她慢慢地答道。{/n}“好吧，我愿意与你同行。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante varios segundos con la mirada fija en la lejanía. Poco a poco, forzando las palabras, responde:{/n} «Así sea. Iré contigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante varios segundos con la mirada fija en la lejanía. Poco a poco, forzando las palabras, responde:{/n} «Así sea. Iré contigo».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは数秒間、黙り込んであなたの背後をじっと見つめている。ゆっくりと言葉を紡ぎ出して返答する。{/n}「そのようにさせてもらう。共に行こう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは数秒間、黙り込んであなたの背後をじっと見つめている。ゆっくりと言葉を紡ぎ出して返答する。{/n}「そのようにさせてもらう。共に行こう」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einige Sekunden, ihr Blick fixiert etwas hinter dir. Sie wählt ihre Worte mit Bedacht und sagt langsam:{/n} "So sei es. Ich werde mit Euch gehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einige Sekunden, ihr Blick fixiert etwas hinter dir. Sie wählt ihre Worte mit Bedacht und sagt langsam:{/n} "So sei es. Ich werde mit Euch gehen."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet garde le silence pendant un long moment en regardant au loin. Elle finit par répondre lentement, en prononçant nettement chaque mot :{/n} « Très bien. Je vous accompagne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet garde le silence pendant un long moment en regardant au loin. Elle finit par répondre lentement, en prononçant nettement chaque mot :{/n} « Très bien. Je vous accompagne. »

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bakışları uzaklara dalmış hâlde birkaç saniye sessiz kalıyor. Sözcüklerini uzatarak, yavaş yavaş yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun. Seninle geleceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for several seconds, her gaze fixed on something beyond you. Slowly, drawing out her words, she replies,{/n} "So be it. I will go with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bakışları uzaklara dalmış hâlde birkaç saniye sessiz kalıyor. Sözcüklerini uzatarak, yavaş yavaş yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Öyle olsun. Seninle geleceğim."
